name: Chisato-WhatsApp
description: A WhatsApp Bot written in TypeScript using Baileys.

timeZone.description: A string for the session to be classified and to get access to the server endpoints

maintenance.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

author.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)
